snippet: The BRIC countries — Brazil, Russia, India and China — have been losing some investment appeal. Some fund managers suggest a look at a broader range of emerging economies.
abstract: BRIC countries--Brazil, Russia, India and China--have been losing some mutual fund investment appeal; MSCI BRIC index lost 2.45 percent, annualized, over three years through September, while broader emerging-markets index gained 3.13 percent; some fund managers suggest a look at a broader range of emerging economies.
lead_paragraph: The BRIC countries — Brazil, Russia, India and China — have been losing some investment appeal. Some fund managers suggest a look at a broader range of emerging economies.

headline.seo: Emerging-Market Investors Looking Beyond the BRICs
headline.main: Emerging Markets Are More Than Just the BRICs
headline.print_headline: Emerging Markets Are More Than Just the BRICs
